page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart data map method

argument.name: data
argument.description: The raw data from which the chart will be created. If no data is passed in then the map must have the "data" property defined in it.

argument.name: map
argument.description: The definition to map the raw data into a format used by the charting logic. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Map Object]*.

argument.name: temp
argument.description: The "temporary" object that is passed to all functions and template expands. The can be used to pass in external data and settings as well as pass information between calls.

return.name: map
return.description: The mapped data. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Object]*

page.description: Create a mapping of raw data into a format usable by the charting logic.
